CREATE TABLE item(
itemNo varchar(10) not null , title varchar(50), category varchar(50), condition_ varchar(50), brand varchar(50), color varchar(50), startDate varchar(20), endDate varchar(20), startPrice varchar(20), buyPrice varchar(20), reservePrice varchar(20), desc_ varchar(1000),
primary key(itemNo) )
insert into item (itemNo, title, category, condition_, brand, color, startDate, endDate, startPrice, buyPrice, reservePrice, desc_) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select * from item where item.itemNo = ?
select * from item
delete from item where item.itemNo = ?

update item as i set i.title = ?, i.category = ?, i.condition_ = ?, i.brand = ?, i.color = ?, i.startDate = ?, i.endDate = ?, i.startPrice = ?, i.buyPrice = ?, i.reservePrice = ?, i.desc_ = ? where i.itemNo = ?
select i.itemNo from item as i

CREATE TABLE category(
catNo varchar(50) not null, catName varchar(100), subName varchar(100),
primary key(catNo) )
insert into category (catNo, catName, subName) values (?, ?, ?)
select * from category where category.catNo = ?
select * from category
delete from category where category.catNo = ?
update category as c set c.catName = ?, c.subName = ? where c.catNo = ?
select c.catNo from category as c

select * from user

update user as u set u.uName = ?, u.uMail = ?, u.uPass = ?, u.uR_Pass = ? where u.uId = ?

PRIMARY KEY(id) )
insert into payment (id, cardNo, cusName, expiryDate, cvv, email, amount, phone) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

select * from payment
delete from payment where payment.id = ?
update payment as p set p.cardNo = ?, p.cusName = ?, p.expiryDate = ?, p.cvv = ?, p.email = ?, p.amount = ?, p.phone = ? where p.id = ?
